meanings.definition: To surpass in achievement or excellence.
meanings.sent1: She outdone her previous record in the race.
meanings.sent2: He outdone all his classmates in the science project.
meanings.sent3: The little ant outdone the big grasshopper in carrying food.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness outdone any material possession.
meanings.sent5: The sun outdone the stars in brightness that night.

meanings.definition: To defeat or surpass in a competition or comparison.
meanings.sent1: The underdog team outdone the champions in the final match.
meanings.sent2: She outdone her opponent in the chess tournament.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outdone the birds in gathering nuts for winter.
meanings.sent4: His determination outdone any obstacle in his path.
meanings.sent5: The river outdone its banks after heavy rainfall.
